Some people don't learn anything, don't learn, don't fucking want to learn. You've seen too many American films or you're greedy. You tell him about the anomalies, and he tells you about the loot. They don't want to think about anything but money. Till his guts are scattered to the crows.

As if I, a soldier of these cum-heads. The second time all the profit for the month was taken away with the cat. What do you do for a living if this is the way things are? Sitting at their fucking roadblocks. And they're riding our coattails into heaven.

Two stalkers are sitting in a bar, they've had a good drink and are discussing everyone around them. The laziest are the military. Stalkers are robbed at the cordon itself. Took away the loot and sold it to Sidorovich 100 metres away. No, and you're wrong. The laziest are the tradesmen. I know a guy who gets up early so he can stay up longer to do nothing.

Anyway, zone, forest, clearing, there's a bloodsucker sitting on the doorstep of an old spinster. Then a little bloodsucker comes running out of the house and to Daddy, braking him. Dad, Dad, Dad, show me the Stalkers. Dad, show me the Stalkers. The one went in the old lady, comes out with a skull on each arm. And begins, as in puppet theatre, the left skull so subtly. Semyonovich, listen, do you think there are bloodsuckers here? The right one's so bassy, Petrukha. What the hell are bloodsuckers?

A young stalker is walking through the zone. There's a grove, or a small grove, and it's not on the map. Well, green back and forth, as it were. I don't know how to get in, and I don't know how to get around. There's one looming nearby. And he doesn't look like a Drogovian or a mercenary. The young one was glad to see him, so-and-so, can you tell me how to get round this grove here? Someone says, I'm going that way too, let's go together. They're walking well, walking quietly. The young one gets bored and starts sucking up. That's what's great about being a grated stalker. Don't be scared of every rustle, don't carry a lot of guns. You couldn't really see the man's gun. So he starts laughing. Who's there to be afraid of? How does the young one wonder? Well, it's monsters, controllers alone. The man's so quiet and says, offended, you fool. I'd say zombie or bloodsucker, but us controllers, why are you calling me a monster?

A stalker appeared in the black zone. He comes to the camp at night and sticks his hand in there into the tent and says, "Vodecka, win!" And if you take a swig from a flask or go outside, is going to get nailed. One man decided to make a joke. Crawled quietly out of the tent, put on a leather glove, and went into the neighbours' tent. So, he begged, "Vodka, vodka, vodka for a drink!" And then a hand comes out of the tent towards him because of the a throaty little tsap and a husky little voice calls out softly. "And what do you need my water for?"

Stalker was once captured by Stalker's mercenaries. Went to the well, dunked him head down waist-deep. After a minute they pull it out and ask. "Got any artefacts Dough?" He told them "no." They lower it again, pull it out, ask. "Got any artefacts Dough?" No, I don't. Dunked again and asked again. "Got any artefacts Dough?" Well, you couldn't take it. Shit, you either go deeper or hold it longer. You can't see shit on the bottom.

The experienced Stalker returns to his jeep. There's a supervisor hanging around. Stalker, get out of here while you're still in one piece. The controller took offence. Well, are you crazy? I've needed your wreck for ages. And Stalker's got his fire, I said get out. You'll steal it, you tell me. But scribbling some bollocks on you will.

The old young ones are walking through the zone, suddenly the old one stops and says in a whisper to the younger one, quietly go to that tree over there. Tadpole crawled on tiptoe, sweating, to get there and shows the molun with his hands, and then what do you do? and she'll scream with joy. Oh, I told you, they're lying, they're lying, they're lying about it being an anomaly.
Once upon a time, the Bloodsucker and the Controller collided in the Agroprom dungeons. The Bloodsucker. You scared me. You monster. Checker, look at you. What a prince charming.

Rookie's walking through the zone. He was dreaming, but he didn't see the enemy, and he's going to go down the drain. And downstairs is the meat grinder. Well, Stalker thinks that's it, goodbye mums. And then he got popped by someone. He sees it's a zombie grabbing him and pulling him, now somewhere. Stalker him and asks him if it's a zombie.... Thanks for saving me from the meat grinder. Where are you taking me? And the zombie to him. The controller likes fresh meat, mince doesn't. You can't talk to food.

Retired old Stalker, sits himself at the kamen with a handy dog and reads. In Greek and Roman mythology, Cerberus. A monstrous three-headed dog with an altered tail guarding the entrance to the underworld. There's a GAF dog! Stalker was alarmed, immediately went for the gun, but everything was quiet. He's to the dog, what are you doing, mate? And that GAF-GAF-GAF-GAFNO is your mythology.

Stalker goes into a bar, Bartender, give me something to eat. The bartender, so the bartender starts. Well, there's an eye of flesh in tomato sauce today, fried snorkel feet in tomato sauce, from a bloodsucker fish tentacle in tomato sauce. Stalker's skewered. What are you talking about? Poisoning people? The bartender was also skewered. Who's shouting, me? And Stalker? Why, me? With mushroom sauce. What the hell's a tomato?

One stalker says to another, and I always take a picture of my mother-in-law with me on a hike. Why? What about it? Cold, mud, anomaly, mutants. And I look at the card and I think, God, this feels good.
Brought one of the puppies to the zone once, to show something how. Some things surprised him, some outraged him, and some things were stolen from him.
Stalker planted a pseudorepka, grew a pseudorepka big-big, took a stalker grenade launcher and went to extract it. And he would have succeeded if the pseudo-bugs and pseudo-flies hadn't swooped in.

Stalker once went on a VAD tour. To him the devil shows him the torments that sinners endure. Boiling tarns, red-hot embers, fire all around, bopli, grey stinks. Stalker looks at all this and says to hell with it. What's up, cheeks? It's dry here, and you've got more fun than we have on the marshes. So I think I'm gonna stay here for a while.

Once the scientists decided to conduct field trials of a new drug, well, and hired a group of stalkers to do the job. A few days go by, one stalker comes to the professor and says, "Hear that, and you've changed my wheels, haven't you?" He fixed his glasses and said cautiously, "Why did you suddenly think that the drug had been changed? And Stalker, I used to throw pills in a puddle and they would sink, but now suddenly they're floating.
The doctor listens to the stalker coming in for an appointment and sentences. All right, all right, all right. Doctor, what's good," the stalker asks. Good thing it's not me.

Three stalkers share advice. One of them says, "I got myself a black jacket, so now The gangsters think I'm one of their own and don't touch me. Second. I dyed my suit to look like an army suit from afar it looks like a bulletproof vest. Third. And I'm wearing an old tattered jumpsuit, and on the back, it says, I'm not lucky, you touch me and my bad luck will be passed on to you. So no one comes within 50 metres.

So the stalker came to the doctor. The doctor examines him and says, "This one is from fatigue, it's from nervous tension, and that's for depression." Thank you, Doctor, thank you. Tell me, do you have anything besides vodka there's nothing?

The stalker meets his old friend, and there is a wrinkled all fengal under the eye. Petya, what's wrong with you? Yeah, shit, they attacked me, beat me up, took my money. Do you even remember them? What's there to memorise? A wife.

One stalker asks another, do you know what the most stalker car is? No, replies the one who does. Zaporozhets? Why? It's as simple as that! Reliable as a tank. And a boot in the front, so you can keep an eye on your loot.

Stalker and Vayaga, Stalker-soldatum, crossed paths once near the cordon. Where are you scratching? What are you, a man? Fucking hell! That's a military secret! Hey, take it easy, I didn't know. What are you carrying so heavy? I'm sweating. Oh, man, you're sweating in here. Those armour-piercing rounds are going to the warehouse.

Stalker stashed in the tree Khabar, well, and one evening decided to check how it is there, whether everything is intact. Well, and it should be, sits someone there, rustling, legs bass dangling, Stalker sneaks up and tsap that on the tree sits firmly between his legs, and strictly to koskazi padla, who is who, from what group, in response silence. Well Stalker pressed even harder, who is he, I ask, and he again silent, but angry Stalker, squeezed so that straight down the arm flowed, you listen to the bastard, and I will now generally tear off everything, I answer, who is he, quickly, and from above such, husky, weak voice, I am the controller, and why did you keep silent bastard, but I'm not mine.
Duza manal! Bonyal!
